channel.title: /*=†(pur3zscape 317)†=*\
channel.description:
alright, i know that the name is used often, but tbh i love it a lot.. lets being shall we ... ;)
[b]CREDITS[/b] *Delta_ = orb tuts. *Tatemo = Zombie COD5 nazi minigame - idea ;) <33 *JjX = adding models. -------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]FEATURES[/b] ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ -100% = COD5 nazi zombie minigame. -100% 63 Jad fight cave waves =100% fightcaves minigame. -100% castlewars -100% all models - custom pVp armour, weapons.. -100% clan chat. -78% rotating cannon. -summoning -consturction -dueling [idk yet..] -all 24 skills 100% working.. -godwars - zilyana, graandor. -certian holiday events.. =santa autospawns on christmas =Easter bunny auto spawns on Easter. =custom uncle sam NPC on 4th of july - gives out christmas cracker :D!! =kalphite queen. =owner is: Ice. [meh] =i think their's a custom strong hold of security.. =home is CURRENTLY fally..idk where to put it ;\ any ideas? post!
=What i'm working on= *trying to make my guns work.. *trying to find a new home..fally isn't doing it ;\!! *just got thieving to work..wewtnezz?
=info about zombie minigame= well, i found a good battlegrounds place, and spawned a couple of zombies..they have 150+hp, and the object is just to kill them all..they drop rare items ^^ [b]DROPS[/b] -bunny ears RARE! -easter egg -rune arrows -adamant arrows -mith arrows -steel arrows -iron arrows -bronze arrows -guns =Desert eagle =SMG
=custom stronghold of security= -4 levels -chest -chest 1-3 you collect a total of 25M -chest 4 = rubber chicken :)
alright i don't have any pictures yet, but i'll start uploading when i get back form movies wiff gf ^^.
whenever i finish the source, i'll release it for you leechers..but don't expect it to not have a anti leech ;)
Base= -Devolution ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PICTURES ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ didn't take pictures of my stronghold, or my zombie minigame cuz i don't want people to steal it :) more info below the pix thought.. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [URL=http://s661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/?action=view&current=clip1311.flv][IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/th_clip1311.jpg[/img][/URL]

[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/pkshop1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/pkshop2.jpg[/img]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *Zombie Minigame Info* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -you walk in the portal thats in the center of fally palace..you enter the portal you you appear in a war arena, where their are many things to hide behind and keep you're self safe from the zombies..they are level 95, and only use their hands to attack you. since the guns don't use range yet, you use cross bows, and bow and arrows. you can do it in teams, tbh it dosen't really matter. each one drops a random item..each one could be rare, or not rare depending on you're luck..you can see their drops above.. i worked pretty hard on this so if you don' like I WILL KILL YOU!...
-Strong hold of security.
[b][u]LEVELS[/u][/b] -first level, is in deep sea under water, at the end of the mazes, their is a portal at the end of the mazes, you enter and you go to level 2..
-second level, is in a deeper part under water..their are monsters that will attack you..so watch out..again, their is a portal at the end of the level, where you enter the portal and go to the third level..
-third level, higher level monsters, WILL kill you, i reccomend food..pots etc..than you get to the 4th level..
-fourth level, zombies, ghost, monsters etc..than you enter a last portal..
-fith level, you kill a monster, in which it drops rubber chicken[s] :)!!!
thats my pride and possession, so tell me if you like it atm..
wish me luck guys, i'll release it as soon as i get around to finishing it..
-Mod Assassin.

item.title: /*=†(pur3zscape 317)†=*\
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

alright, i know that the name is used often, but tbh i love it a lot… lets being shall we …

CREDITS
*Delta_ = orb tuts.
*Tatemo = Zombie COD5 nazi minigame - idea <33
*JjX = adding models.

FEATURES
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
-100% = COD5 nazi zombie minigame.
-100% 63 Jad fight cave waves
=100% fightcaves minigame.
-100% castlewars
-100% all models - custom pVp armour, weapons…
-100% clan chat.
-78% rotating cannon.
-summoning
-consturction
-dueling [idk yet…]
-all 24 skills 100% working…
-godwars - zilyana, graandor.
-certian holiday events…
=santa autospawns on christmas
=Easter bunny auto spawns on Easter.
=custom uncle sam NPC on 4th of july - gives out christmas cracker :D!!
=kalphite queen.
=owner is: Ice. [meh]
=i think their’s a custom strong hold of security…
=home is CURRENTLY fally…idk where to put it ;\ any ideas? post!

=What i’m working on=
*trying to make my guns work…
*trying to find a new home…fally isn’t doing it ;!!
*just got thieving to work…wewtnezz?

=info about zombie minigame=
well, i found a good battlegrounds place, and spawned a couple of zombies…they have 150+hp, and the object is just to kill them all…they drop rare items ^^
DROPS
-bunny ears RARE!
-easter egg
-rune arrows
-adamant arrows
-mith arrows
-steel arrows
-iron arrows
-bronze arrows
-guns
=Desert eagle
=SMG

=custom stronghold of security=
-4 levels
-chest
-chest 1-3 you collect a total of 25M
-chest 4 = rubber chicken

alright i don’t have any pictures yet, but i’ll start uploading when i get back form movies wiff gf ^^.

whenever i finish the source, i’ll release it for you leechers…but don’t expect it to not have a anti leech

Base=
-Devolution

PICTURES

didn’t take pictures of my stronghold, or my zombie minigame cuz i don’t want people to steal it more info below the pix thought…

Zombie Minigame Info

-you walk in the portal thats in the center of fally palace…you enter the portal you you appear in a war arena, where their are many things to hide behind and keep you’re self safe from the zombies…they are level 95, and only use their hands to attack you. since the guns don’t use range yet, you use cross bows, and bow and arrows. you can do it in teams, tbh it dosen’t really matter. each one drops a random item…each one could be rare, or not rare depending on you’re luck…you can see their drops above… i worked pretty hard on this so if you don’ like I WILL KILL YOU!..

-Strong hold of security.

LEVELS
-first level, is in deep sea under water, at the end of the mazes, their is a portal at the end of the mazes, you enter and you go to level 2…

-second level, is in a deeper part under water…their are monsters that will attack you…so watch out…again, their is a portal at the end of the level, where you enter the portal and go to the third level…

-third level, higher level monsters, WILL kill you, i reccomend food…pots etc…than you get to the 4th level…

-fourth level, zombies, ghost, monsters etc…than you enter a last portal…

-fith level, you kill a monster, in which it drops rubber chicken[s] :)!!!

thats my pride and possession, so tell me if you like it atm…

wish me luck guys, i’ll release it as soon as i get around to finishing it…

-Mod Assassin.

Read full topic
